channel.title: Most realistic Server package?
channel.description: Has anyone made a modded server package to be as real to runescape as possible? Talking NPC's? NORMAL EXP growth? Tutorial island, character creator? I know there's tons of tutorials out, but to match them all up to a single server... is there a package like that out there?

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @deidera deidera
item.description:
@deidera wrote:

Pk3r Dale:

maby he wants his server like rs

RS3 anyone,private server lol.Anyways,since it’s almost impossible to make it like real RS2 or RSC,you gota hack jagex,get the codes and paste them into your server :). Or,if you can’t do that,go play on a Private server.

K,I know this is breaking rules but r00nscape.no-ip.org/info is almost exactly like real RS,except no KBD,duel arena,but training and value etc etc are the same.Good luck.

PS: Maybe it has duel arena/KQ/KBD etc.

PPS: Don’t report me for advertising-I helped him on his quesion and I think he’ll probably appreciate my answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @Sark Sark
item.description:
@Sark wrote:

[quote=“stephen horn, post:8, topic:46113”]I think the perfect server would be almost exactly like rs but you lvl faster, don’t need to use runes or arrows, and armor is cheaper. But if you don’t like my ideas for a perfect server, you can always go to someone elses, thats the cool part of moparscape. You find a server you like and stick with it. My personal favorite server is samscape.servebeer.com[/quote]Actually, I like that idea perfectly. Depends on how FAST the leveling is though… maybe 2x, 3x at the max. Mainly I just want the NPC’s to work correctly… plus the actual skills like wood cutting, firemaking, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @stephen_horn stephen horn
item.description:
@stephen_horn wrote:

I think the perfect server would be almost exactly like rs but you lvl faster, don’t need to use runes or arrows, and armor is cheaper. But if you don’t like my ideas for a perfect server, you can always go to someone elses, thats the cool part of moparscape. You find a server you like and stick with it. My personal favorite server is samscape.servebeer.com

Read full topic

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Sark, post:6, topic:46113”]And if you see no point in something it must be totally useless, right?

I just want a source thats close to the real RS. Then I can edit it to make it better. But currently finding sources with mute NPC’s (most sources), the inability to chop trees (easyscape), and not being ab;e to pick your gender doesn’t seem better than the real RS to me…

I’d just rather have a source closer to the Real RS to start with. This isn’t a debate or discussion thread, I was simply asking if such a source existed or not. If not, the sooner i find out, the sooner I can start collecting tutorials, finding which source most have in common, and start making one of my own.

(PS. Oh, and Follow is nice too)[/quote]

Try WhiteScape or a basic unedited server source, which you can code to your liking.

Read full topic

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @Sark Sark
item.description:
@Sark wrote:

And if you see no point in something it must be totally useless, right?

I just want a source thats close to the real RS. Then I can edit it to make it better. But currently finding sources with mute NPC’s (most sources), the inability to chop trees (easyscape), and not being ab;e to pick your gender doesn’t seem better than the real RS to me…

I’d just rather have a source closer to the Real RS to start with. This isn’t a debate or discussion thread, I was simply asking if such a source existed or not. If not, the sooner i find out, the sooner I can start collecting tutorials, finding which source most have in common, and start making one of my own.

(PS. Oh, and Follow is nice too)

item.title: Most realistic Server package?
item.dc:creator: @Sark Sark
item.description:
@Sark wrote:

Well, I would make mine that way, except there’s this packet for one server, another packet for a completely different server base, etc. Plus, I like it being eidted, but leveling to lvl. 23 in one fight? Come on. I can raise my smithing by fighting a training bag…

Plus NPC’s talking and not getting adamite from them is kinda nice too. And sorry, but not all the players want to be the generic male xP

I was just wondering if anyone else like me has taken a popular server base and moded it then zipped it and have it somewhere.

Read full topic
